titleStmt.title: Proclamation, discharging the importation of brandy-vvine. Edinburgh, the thirteenth day of February, one thousand six hundred and sixty eight.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
